original_title: Før, under og etter Flåklypa Grand Prix
overview: Remo Caprino loosely and grippingly tells the story about the making of the now beloved norwegian movie, the production itself and the cultural impact it has had for almost 40 years.
tagline: Dra meg baklengs inn i fuglekassa
title: Before, during and after the Pinchcliffe Grand Prix
